#summary The <sheet> Tag

= Introduction =

The `<sheet>` tag is the root element for a Nerdcules character sheet.


= Details =

Every Nerdcules character sheet has exactly one `<sheet>` tag as the root element. The `<sheet>` must contain exactly one [TagHead <head>], at least one [TagSet <set>], and zero or more [TagBreak <break>] tags.

== Example ==

<code language="xml">
<sheet>
  <head>
  </head>
  <set name="example">
  </set>
</sheet>
</code>
